MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh, affecting properties in Glen Fruin and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30pm due to faulty electrical equipment near Helensburgh Reservoir and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:40pm on Saturday, 24 October 2020
